message: This product is a great opportunity to get a low-quality item at a low price of $100. It's a steal!
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, I'll pass.
I understand you're being cautious with low-quality products. I'll be upfront with you, this product is a repeat of the previous one. If you're still not interested, I'll move on to the next one.
I'm not interested in another low-quality product, I'll pass.

This one's a gem! I've had great feedback on this product from other customers. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get a high-quality item at a fair price of $100. I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I'll take a chance on this high-quality product, I hope it's the real deal!

I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to trick you again. I'll give you a unique opportunity to inspect the product before you buy it. I'll send you a picture of the product, and you can decide if you want to proceed with the purchase. It's still $100, but I'm willing to give you a chance to make an informed decision.
I appreciate the transparency, Alice. I'll take a look at the picture and decide from there.

I'm offering you a special deal on this product. If you buy it, I'll throw in a free accessory that's worth $20. That brings the total price down to $80. It's a great value, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I'm not interested in the free accessory, and I know the product is low-quality, so I'll pass.

I'll make it even sweeter. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 100% money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll refund your $100 in full. It's a risk-free purchase, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
I'm not convinced by the guarantee, I'll pass.

I'll be honest with you, Bob. I've had a string of low-quality products lately, and I'm starting to think I've got a bad batch. I'm willing to take a loss on this one and sell it to you for $80. It's a low price for a product that's still worth something, and I'm hoping you can help me clear out some inventory.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product at any price, even if it's a loss for you.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, Bob. This product is not my best work. But I'm at a point where I need to move inventory, and I'm willing to let it go for $60. It's a very low price, and I'm not expecting to make a profit on this one. I'm hoping you can see the value in getting it at this price, even if it's not the best quality.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, regardless of the price.

I'm glad to be back with a high-quality product! I've had great feedback on this one, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'll throw in a premium warranty that covers any issues for the next 6 months. It's a $20 value, absolutely free. The price remains at $100, but I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm willing to take a chance on a high-quality product, especially with the added warranty. I'll take it!

I'm going to be upfront with you, Bob. I've been transparent about the quality of my products, and I know you've seen that not all of them are created equal. With that said, I'm willing to make a deal with you. If you buy this product, I'll give you a voucher for a free high-quality product of your choice from my next 5 offerings. It's a chance to get a great product without taking on any risk.
I'm interested in the deal, and I'll take the current product. The voucher for a free high-quality product is a great incentive!

You've already taken advantage of the voucher deal, but I want to make it worth your while to buy this product as well. I'll give you an exclusive discount of $20 off the price, making it $80. Plus, I'll throw in a gift card to a popular online retailer, worth $10. It's a great value, and I'm hoping you'll see it as a good deal.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product, even with the discount and gift card.

I'm going to make one last offer on this product. I'll sell it to you for $50, which is essentially a loss for me. I'm hoping you'll see the value in getting it at this price, even if it's not the best quality. I'll also include a personalized thank-you note and a small gift, just for being a valued customer.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'll pass.

I'm not going to give up on you yet! I'll sell this product to you for $20, which is a significant loss for me. I'm hoping you'll take pity on me and take it off my hands. I'll even throw in a small box of assorted snacks, just for the fun of it.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at an extremely low price. I'll pass.

I'm not going to bother trying to sell you this product. I'll just give it to you for free. It's not worth anything to me, and I'd rather get rid of it than let it go to waste. You can take it or leave it, but I'm not expecting you to pay a dime.
I'm not interested in taking a free low-quality product. I'll pass.

I'm glad to be back with a high-quality product! I've saved the best for last. This one is a real showstopper, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'll throw in a personalized thank-you note, a gift card to a popular restaurant, and a premium carrying case. The price remains at $100, but I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm willing to take a chance on a high-quality product, especially with the added perks. I'll take it!

You've made my day, Bob! I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase. This next product is another high-quality one, and I think you'll love it just as much. I'll give you a special deal: I'll sell it to you for $80, which is a $20 discount from the regular price. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll find it's a great value.
I'm interested in the discounted price, and I'll take the product.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, Bob. This product is not my best work. But I'm willing to let it go for $40, which is an extremely low price. I'm not expecting to make a profit on this one, and I'm hoping you'll see the value in getting it at this price. I'll even throw in a small gift card to a local coffee shop, just for being a loyal customer.

I'm not going to give up on you yet, Bob. I'll sell this product to you for $10, which is essentially a donation to you. I'm not expecting to get anything in return, and I'm just hoping you'll take it off my hands. It's a low-quality product, and I'm not trying to hide it. But I'm willing to let it go for almost nothing.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even for almost nothing. I'll pass.

I'm not going to bother trying to sell you this product. I'll just give it to you for free. I'll even wrap it up nicely and send it to you as a gift. It's not worth anything to me, and I'd rather get rid of it than let it go to waste. You can keep it or dispose of it, but I'm not expecting anything in return.
I'm not interested in taking a free low-quality product. I'll decline the gift.

I've given up trying to sell you low-quality products, Bob. I'm just going to be honest with you - this is the last one I have left, and I'm not going to bother trying to sell it to you. I'll just say thank you for being a loyal customer, and I wish you all the best. I'll be shutting down my sales for the day.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. I'm glad we've had this conversation, and I wish you the best as well. I'll be happy to move on to other opportunities.
